metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19217 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In ncurses, possibly a 6.x version, there is a NULL pointerdereference at the function _nc_name_match that will lead to a denial ofservice attack. NOTE: the original report stated version 6.1, but the issuedid not reproduce for that version according to the maintainer or areliable third-party.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
